title: Height
text:
This stately ward of [[Io'lokar]] is a hub of academic and scholarly tradition, and is thus the virtual heart of the city. The cityâ€™s [[four great colleges|Colleges of Io'lokar]] are here, as are the apartments of their [[wizard]]s, sages, and loremasters. More so than in the lower wards, the architecture here reflects the soaring stone and crystalline style seen in the [[draconic observatories|planar observatory]] of [[Argonnessen]].
